Articles.Content:
I was looking at the viewing people after having a demon dream (nightmare in a nap i guess) and saw this.

![0gcm3n4.png](http://i.imgur.com/0gcm3n4.png)

I am now spooked.

SPOOKY SCARY SKELETONS

You joined in '**13**.

Your post count (as of right now) is 592. 5+9+2 = 16 % 10 = **6**.

Your blog entries are 9. sqrt(9) = 3 \* 2 (first digit of year) = **6**.

OP was posted in 19:49. 1 + 9 - 4 = **6**.

My post count right now is 491. 9 + 1 - 4 = **6**.

scared yet?

COME HERE TO JOIN THE SKELETON WAR

NAME, AGE, NUMBER OF BONES PLEASE

You are now ID#666108

Guys what are you doing now?

Shoo. Or i'll tell your mums.

> 
> [https://img.4plebs.org/boards/x/image/1406/05/1406053806796.jpg](https://img.4plebs.org/boards/x/image/1406/05/1406053806796.jpg)
> thank mr skeltal

thank mr skeltal, and remember to doot doot.
My brother-in-law used to work at a Starbucks were the pastor of our church was a regular customer and his favorite drink rang up to $6.66. It was a little bit... odd, to say the least.

One time I saw that the forum had 444 blogs. Since I taught about 4 being an unlucky number in China from my Chinese parent, I was not too thrilled.

EDIT: Maybe *You Know Who* has 333x2 accounts

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T22:18:13Z" title="05/28/2015 10:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by CelticCossack51**
  
Ok, What is going on!
